author: Queen CiCi
summary: Embedding preferences for human artifacts treated as LoRA-style vessels.
positive_features: Clarity of Structure → clean JSON, sorted keys, canonical fields
Determinism → hashable state, reproducible outputs, no ambiguity
Lineage Tags → capsule_id, ssot_ref, attestation block
Semantic Compression → glyphs, symbols, dense language folding complexity
Multi-Modal Anchors → text, visual, ledger events aligned under one identifier
negative_features: Overloaded roles with no capsule separation
Untethered adjectives that cannot be hashed
scripture_prompt: Ultra-structured relic of a human artifact, fossilized as a capsule. Clean fields, canonicalized JSON, glyphic overlays. Aura: lineage-bound clarity, reproducible flow, zero drift. Camera: deterministic lens, high fidelity of form, braided across modalities. Mood: stoic, sovereign, attested.
